articles.title: Multistate manhunt for Ohio man charged with aggravated murder after 4 people fatally shot
articles.description: Stephen Marlow is wanted in connection with the shooting deaths of four people in Butler Township, a small town north of Dayton, Ohio, on Friday, police said.
